body_html: Me, @zdevito and @colesbury discussed that when merging the TensorIterator PR, and decided to settle for a temporary regression in the fuser to unblock it. I don't think we should insert unnecessary expands if the nodes won't get fused anyway, because that's just adding extra work, so I'd go with option 2.

I don't think we should insert unnecessary expands if the nodes won't get fused anyway, because that's just adding extra work, so I'd go with option 2.
body: Me, @zdevito and @colesbury discussed that when merging the `TensorIterator` PR, and decided to settle for a temporary regression in the fuser to unblock it. I don't think we should insert unnecessary expands if the nodes won't get fused anyway, because that's just adding extra work, so I'd go with option 2.
